casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jimmy Lee FORTE, Jr. No. 223PA18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Forte, Jimmy Lee (Jr.) Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of August 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
